pros: Features clean ingredients that moisturize and protect lips

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive lips/skin!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years on my kids’ lips. Both get chapped easy even in summer. This is smooth, soothing, absorbs well and has no waxy residue like other “Chap”-esque tubs and tubes. Both kiddos have sensitive skin/eczema and this isn’t irritating. Takes very little-between twin 4 year olds, one tube lasts about two winter months. The flavor and smell are different-not fruity, not bad or chemical. Seems typical of colloidal oat and Shea ingredients. No leftover tingle either, as it contains no mints or menthol type oils. My kids abhor stuff that tingles (rolls eyes), while I love it. Anyhoo, worth the price imho.
